Subject: Re: Lets Get Dangerous !
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

Motormaster takes the brunt of the shots being fired at him as they
ricochet of his armored hull, and maneuvers himself towards Liono, drawing
his sword. He turns to Killfest, and over his comlink speaks "we need to
get in there to check what is going on, we will let Astroblast check it
out, we'll keep them busy. He then turns to Liono, "Now Maximal, feel the
anger of a Decepticon, and he swings towards his enemy. As he move he
silently on a different frequency from everyone, so no one else  could
normally hear it (unless they intercept) "Astroblast, I will keep them
busy, get on the ark and find our target. If it's not there look through
Teletran's datatracks to find it."
